title: Chapter 1854 - I Won’T Rest Until My Enemy Is Dead
body:
Chapter 1854 - I Won’T Rest Until My Enemy Is Dead

This unexpected development involved the Book of Karma.

Gu Yunchan tried to use the Book of Karma to block Su Yi’s slash, only for it to forcefully knock away his fingers and break free of his grip.

It broke free with such force that Gu Yunchan’s retreating figure slowed momentarily.

Meanwhile——

Clang!!!

The golden fishing rod shook violently as the tyrannical blade qi knocked it aside. Then, the Crescent Moon Blade’s power continued, its strength undiminished, as it cleaved directly into Gu Yunchan.

Splurt!

The blade left a gash that extended from Gu Yunchan’s shoulders to his belly. It was so deep that even his bones were visible.

A waterfall of blood gushed forth. He’d practically been disemboweled!

And that wasn’t the end of it. That tyrannical blade qi invaded Gu Yunchan’s body, practically mincing his internal organs. The agony was so intense that he couldn’t help but let out a muffled grunt.

Su Yi didn’t even hesitate to swing the blade once more, but before he could, he caught a glimpse of a line of text out of the corner of his eye.

“Hurry up and throw the blade away!”

Su Yi’s pupils constricted, but he did as the Book of Karma told him and threw the Crescent Moon Blade away.

Boom!
